name: Last Guardian (VanillaGameDev)
description:
This is for VimJam2

Short Story:

So there is a ancient building in a world and in those places there are a lot of precious treasures, so many treasure hunters go to that place and steal the treasures till only 1 treasure left, you will play as the last treasure Guardian who wants to the last treasure place and keep that last treasure in any cost, after helping other Guardian... 

So Don't let treasure hunter steal the last Treasure!!

How To Play

AD - Move

SPACE - Jump

RMB - Dash

LMB - Attack

i love to hear any feedback!!
